author: mturk
msg: Omit the bitmap resources from console and dll mode.

author: mturk
msg: Add the User and Password edit boxes.
They are used to launch the Tomcat under different user account.
The service launch account and Tomcat account can be different.
The user need to have 'Log on As Service' priviledge.

msg: Fix zombie try icon when quiting using Process->Exit menu item.

author: mturk
msg: Search for JDK install directory and force setting the JDK/bin
to childs PATH environment variable. This enables javac to be found.
